comments:

Added check for null. Need to find out how to obtain the location of the artifact that was removed.

(In reply to comment #1)
Also add a NPE after importing (import as plugin) org.eclipse.core.runtime.
Similar stack trace:

Hmmm. This *might* be the same bug, but then again it might not. Depends on which version you are using. If get this NPE with the absolute latest version, 0.1.0.v20070531, on bundle org.eclipse.buckminster.core then the delta returns a null resource. I didn't think it could do that. The old problem was that the resource returned null on getLocation() which it apparently does for deleted projects.

What version do you have?

(In reply to comment #3)
OK Thomas. I had an older version.
Upgraded buckminster.core to 0601 level and no NPE anymore (during delete or import).
Please close as fixed.
Thanks for the fix.
